The path back to a Republican majority in the House goes through California and I look forward to working with Jessica to achieve that goal.

I want to congratulate Jessica Patterson on being selected as the new Chair of the California Republican Party. I know Jessica is ready to help our party do the blocking and tackling necessary win elections and raise the resources needed to run robust campaigns across our state.

Today I joined GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy and Rep. @DanCrenshawTX  to talk about our fight to stop Democrats in their radical push towards socialism kicking families off their private health insurance and legalizing infanticide. The path back to the majority goes through CA. https://t.co/fstvirSlZE
